features: 【1000 ANSI High Brightness & High Contrast & FHD Projector】 With 1000 ANSI high brightness and 20,000:1 high dynamic contrast ratio,XNoogo Full HD Projector provides sharp detailed images from HD content without downscaling or compressing.Its native 1920*1080 resolution brings you 10 times more details than 1080P supported projectors.

【Faster 5G+2.4G WiFi Connection & Multiple Types Inputs】 XNoogo movie projector is designed with the latest Dual Band WIFI connection which provides Faster and more Stable wireless screen mirroring for iOS/Android/Windows devices without extra adapters or apps. In addition, it has diverse input interfaces including HDMI x2/USB x2/VGA/AV/SD card to meet your needs in different scenarios.

【Bluetooth projector & 4k Video & Dolby Digital 】The projector has the funcion of bluetooth,You can connect your ideal bluetooth speaker wirelessly at any time ,XNoogo Projector supports Dolby Digital and 4 K Video ,You will enjoy the all kinds of movie,Music and game with your family or freinds

【450" Big screen & HIFI Stereo Sound & Multi-Function Inputs 】You will be enjoying a Wonderful Viewing Experience with a wide range of 60-450 inches.Sround sound system with 2 Built-in 5 Watt speakers,Connect PC, Fire Stick TV, Laptop, Tablet, DVD for movies. Enjoy Games by connecting Playstation PS3/PS4, WII or XBOX via HDMI port.

【4 Projection Modes & Lifetime Profession Support】This indoor/outdoor projector has 4 Projection Modes: Front Projection / Rear Projection / Front Ceiling Projection / Rear Ceiling Projection. We provide life-long professional Customer Service and Technical Support. If you have any problem or are confused while installing XNoogo Video Projector, contact us.
body.description: Wireless Technology: WIFI Display Compatible Device: TV Stick/PC/Smartphones/PS Brightness: 1000 ANSI/Contrast: 20000:1 Native Resolution: 1920x1080P Speaker: 15W Dual HIFI Speaker Warming tips 1.The best performance is under low light environment for watching TV or playing games. 2.The central of screen for led projector is brighter than the edge of screen. 3. There are 4 holes in the bottom of the projector. When put it to the ceiling, please pull out the rubber first and then install the projector ceiling mount. 4.When you're not using the projector, the projector will enter a 15-minute screen saver.You can play any media(movie,music,photo...) , it not enter the screen saver.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Why do you choose XNoogo wifi 1080p projector? 1.5G Wifi Native 1080P FHD Projector adopts an advanced German LED light source, high quality materials and delicate manufacturing process. The lamp life is up to 100,000 hours. 2.Resolution 1920*1080 pixels , brightness 1000 ANSI and 20000:1 contrast ratio, with outstanding sharpness.Support 4k Video and Dolby Digital 3. XNoogo WIFI Projector: No need to buy any additional HDMI adapter to connect to the smartphone. ,it supports wireless/wired connection. You only need to successfully connect via WIFI and USB cable. Cast screen quickly, bring you the ultimate visual experience.Choose our projector to make mobile phone synchronization easier. 4.Includes the function of Bluetooth, you can connect your ideal Bluetooth speaker wirelessly at any time and place. 5.Big screen(Max 500" display )with 2 powerful built-in 15W speakers and a surround sound system. 6.Modern and Fashion for the face. 7.EASY SETUP: Simple setup and control; just plug & play your presentations, videos, and pictures. 8.XNoogo movie projector supports 4 types of projection modes: Front Projection, Rear Projection, Front Ceiling Projection, Rear Ceiling Projection.(Change the value of Rotate in the option to switch between different projection modes.)

Specifications: Image Tech: 6'' LCD TFT Display Optional Screen: 60"-500" Aspect Ratio: 4:3\16:9 Lamp Type: LED Lamp, 100000 Hrs Voltage:AC100-240V/50-60Hz Zoom: 50% -100% Digital Zoom Projection Mode: Front-Desktop/Rear-Desktop/Front-Ceiling/Rear-Ceiling Wireless Technology: WIFI Display Compatible Device: TV Stick/PC/Smartphones/PS Brightness: 1000 ANSI/Contrast: 20000:1 Native Resolution: 1920x1080P Speaker: 15W Dual HIFI Speaker Warming tips 1.The best performance is under low light environment for watching TV or playing games. 2.The central of screen for led projector is brighter than the edge of screen. 3. There are 4 holes in the bottom of the projector. When put it to the ceiling, please pull out the rubber first and then install the projector ceiling mount. 4.When you're not using the projector, the projector will enter a 15-minute screen saver.You can play any media(movie,music,photo...) , it not enter the screen saver.

The Real Native 1080P Resolution Real Native 1080P Resolution The total number of pixels of the projector determines the native resolution of the projector. The more pixels you can fit in the display, the crisper and more detailed your images will appear for outdoor movies. Higher resolution is especially important for home theater projectors ,gaming projector and business projector. When comparing the number of pixels (resolution) of 1920*1080 Native XNoogo HD 1080P with 500" display, it becomes 4 times higher definition. XNoogo Projector's chip consists of tens of thousands of reflective lenses, each lens is quickly switched every second to render full HD picture. 20000:1 Contrast Ratio The higher the contrast ratio, the better the image color will be. With 20000:1 contrast ration, it will bring you nature close color, instead of wash out color as other low contrast ration projectors. 1000 ANSI Lumens Brightness LCD projector utilizes the bright LED light and LCD display technology, with 1000 ANSI high brightness significantly provides over 60+% brightness than other mini projector, which serves your eyes better. The other video projector can only be used in a completely dark environment, but the XNoogo tv projector can also be used in low light conditions.

The newest 6" 1080p LCD Display To reach more clearer, brighter, and richer colors,XNoogo projector is adopoted the newest 6" 1080p LCD Display. It is more brightness and can show more details, closer to the real effect.At present, the other Projector on the market is generally about 3.5“-5".this picture is dim and image is distortion and color blocks. Rich Color Gamut Up to 99% NTSC To reach more rich colors and vividness of the picture, XNoogo projector has reached the astonishing color gamut of 99%,It can provide up to 17 million color ranges and display 100% RGB color signals for each image. With the adjustment of these three colors and Gamma correction, it can directly and significantly improve the sensory effect of the picture

WIFI CONNECTION Wireless Support: Xnoogo projector designed with the latest WIFI connection which compatible with the Android/iPhone/Win10. Synchronize the smartphone screen just need once-time WIFI connection.Wired Connection: No WIFI environment? XNoogo 4k projector has thought about it, no expensive adapter needed, you can connect projector to your iPhone with a original cable line easily.

Newest Bluetooth 5.2 Function HD movie projector built-in the latest Bluetooth 5.2 chip which can connect your Bluetooth speaker wireless any time freely. How to connect： 1. Make sure that all Bluetooth devices in area are off. ( phone, computer, sound bar) 2. Turn on projector. Click menu. scroll to sound. Turn on bluetooth option. 3. Now turn on device ( my soundbar) and wait a few seconds. You will get a chime that they are connected. Tips： 1. All LCD bluetooth projector can only be used for bluetooth output devices(bluetooth speaker/earphone/headphone/airpods/earbuds), but unable to connect to the phones/pads.

500 Inch Big Screen 60-500 Inch Projection Size 1. With the projection distance of 5-30ft, XNoogo Movie Projector can project 60-500 inch images. By adjusting the distance between the projector and the screen, you can get the image size that works best for you. 2. The recommended projection distance at home is 9 ft with 80 inches screen. With distance of 13 ft, you will get 120 inches images. 3. For outdoor use,as it's not limited by space,you can easily get a large screen experience of more than 400 inches. Tips: Sometimes, the distance is fixed but you need smaller images. At this time, the digital zoom function comes in handy. XNoogo 1080P Projector has an digital zoom function of 50% to 100%. Notice: 1. Due to copyright issues, Disney / Netflix / Amazon prohibits playing movies directly from the projector. Pls use a TV Stick to connect the projector to watch movies from Disney, Netflix and other similar services. 2. Please keep the air filter of the projector clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I will reorder from this supplier again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Extremely good for an inexpensive projector
reviews.reviewText: I got this to have an outside movie fest with mine and my friends kids and, I gotta say, this thing was a HIT! I connected a big speaker bar via bluetooth and my friend had a big projector screen we rigged to the side of the house. I was very surprised at how crisp the detail was. I'm thinking of setting this up to my PS4 and playing GTA on it LOL. Very good deal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Cheap now than during black Friday sale.
reviews.reviewText: The price for the projector was 20$ more on the cyber monday sale than now.. however it's a good quality projector. Only thing I noticed is 2 black spots appearing on the bottom left screen. Looks like little bug or Like something is stuck between the lens. After cleaning the front lens and its still there I assume it's something stuck between the lens... was easy to setup and sync my surround sound system to. Going to ask for replacement

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Goof picture quality
reviews.reviewText: I love the performance and quality of this projector I definitely think it's worth the price. I had no issues setting it up. It's great if you would like to do an outside movie night.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Bluetooth WiFi Projector
reviews.reviewText: Decided to upgrade my projector to this model which has built in Bluetooth and WiFi. It has worked great so far! Very bright and easy set up. I definitely recommend to anyone looking for a good projector at a great price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality, Clear picture, Light weight
reviews.reviewText: Good Quality, Very easy setup too. The project is also very light weight and much clear than my old one.
